paragraphs.zh-tw: 2007年我們設計了這一個幼兒園我們將幼兒園設計成環帶狀樓頂環狀循環，沒有盡頭
paragraphs.en: This is a kindergartenwe designed in 2007. We made this kindergarten to be a circle. It's a kind of endless circulationon top of the roof.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 要是你有孩子你就知道，小孩子喜歡兜圈這就是樓頂外觀。
paragraphs.en: If you are a parent, you know that kids loveto keep making circles. This is how the rooftop looks.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 為什麼我們這樣設計？幼兒園園長說：「我不想要欄杆」我說：這不可能啊但他堅持說：「要不在樓頂兩邊安裝一張網？」「這樣就可以接住掉下來的孩子」「笑聲」我說：這不可能當然政府官員說：「欄杆是必須要有的。」但我們可以將網用在樹邊這裡突出來三棵樹
paragraphs.en: And why did we design this? The principal of this kindergarten said, "No, I don't want a handrail." I said, "It's impossible." But he insisted: "How about having a netsticking out from the edge of the roof? So that it can catchthe children falling off?" I said, "It's impossible." And of course,the government official said, "Of course you have to have a handrail." But we could keep that idea around the trees. There are three trees popping through.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 而且我們可以把把邊上的繩子叫欄杆但當然绳子本身與欄杆無關
paragraphs.en: And we were allowed to call this rope as a handrail. But of course, rope has nothingto do with them.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 小孩掉進網裡然後又有更多的小孩去還有更多更多「笑聲」
paragraphs.en: They fall into the net. And you get more, and more, more.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 有時樹邊會有40個小孩樹幹上的那個男孩他很喜歡那棵樹所以他在吃那棵樹「笑聲」
paragraphs.en: Sometimes 40 children are around a tree. The boy on the branch, he loves the treeso he is eating the tree.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 要是有活動孩子們會坐在樓頂邊上從下往上看真不錯
paragraphs.en: And at the time of an event, they sit on the edge. It looks so nice from underneath.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 動物園的猴子「笑聲」餵食時間「笑聲」「掌聲」
paragraphs.en: Monkeys in the zoo. Feeding time.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 我們盡量把樓頂設計得低一點因為我們希望看到樓頂的孩子孩子不會祗留在樓底樓頂太高的話，就祗能看到天花板
paragraphs.en: And we made the roof as low as possible, because we wanted to seechildren on top of the roof, not only underneath the roof. And if the roof is too high,you see only the ceiling.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 這是洗腳的地方這裡有很多水龍頭大家看見那些活動水管要是你想要往朋友身上灑水還有沐浴噴頭相片中的水龍頭很普通
paragraphs.en: And the leg washing place --there are many kinds of water taps. You see with the flexible tubes, you want to spray waterto your friends, and the shower, and the one in front is quite normal.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 但要是大家仔細看這小男孩不是在洗靴子他在將水灌進靴子裡「笑聲」一年裡，這個幼兒園大部分時間都是完全開放的
paragraphs.en: But if you look at this, the boy is not washing his boots, he's putting water into his boots. This kindergarten is completelyopen, most of the year.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 戶內和戶外沒有限界簡單來說，這個建築物就祗是一個屋頂
paragraphs.en: And there is no boundarybetween inside and outside. So it means basicallythis architecture is a roof.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 課室和課室之間也沒有限界所以這裡也沒有聲音的限界
paragraphs.en: And also there is no boundarybetween classrooms. So there is no acoustic barrier at all.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 把那麼多孩子放在一個安靜的箱子裡有些孩子會覺得很緊張但是在這所幼兒園裡孩子們不會覺得緊張
paragraphs.en: When you put many children in a quiet box, some of them get really nervous. But in this kindergarten, there is no reason they get nervous.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 因為這裡沒有限界幼兒園園長說：要是邊上的男孩不想呆在室內我們就讓他出去
paragraphs.en: Because there is no boundary. And the principal says if the boy in the cornerdoesn't want to stay in the room, we let him go.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 他會回來的這裡就一個圓圈，總會繞回來「笑聲」重點是：在類似的情況下孩子一般會試著躲起來
paragraphs.en: He will come back eventually,because it's a circle, it comes back. But the point is,in that kind of occasion, usually children try to hide somewhere.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 但在這裡他們跑開了又會回來非常自然的過程
paragraphs.en: But here, just they leave and come back. It's a natural process.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 第二，我們認為噪音很重要大家知道，小孩在噪音中睡得更香
paragraphs.en: And secondly, we considernoise very important. You know that childrensleep better in noise.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 他們在安靜的環境下睡不著在這個幼兒園這些小孩在課堂裡表現出驚人的集中力
paragraphs.en: They don't sleep in a quiet space. And in this kindergarten, these children showamazing concentration in class.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 大家知道，我們的祖先是在森林噪音中成長的孩子們需要噪音
paragraphs.en: And you know, our kind grew upin the jungle with noise. They need noise.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 大家可以在嘈雜的酒吧裡與朋友聊天大家不應該停留在無聲狀態
paragraphs.en: And you know, you can talkto your friends in a noisy bar. You are not supposed to be in silence.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 大家也知道，現在大家都在不斷嘗試控制所有事物這裡是完全開放的
paragraphs.en: And you know, these days we are trying to makeeverything under control. You know, it's completely open.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 大家也應該知道冬天零下20度我們出去滑冰夏天就去游泳
paragraphs.en: And you should know that we can go skiing in -20 degrees in winter. In summer you go swimming.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 沙子溫度有50度大家也應該知道：我們是防水的
paragraphs.en: The sand is 50 degrees. And also, you should knowthat you are waterproof.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 你不會在雨中溶掉所以孩子們是應該留在戶外的
paragraphs.en: You never melt in rain. So, children are supposed to be outside.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 我們就應該這樣對待孩子這就是孩子們隔分課室的方式
paragraphs.en: So that is how we should treat them. This is how they divide classrooms.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 他們本應該幫助老師的他們…不幫「笑聲」
paragraphs.en: They are supposed to help teachers. They don't.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 不是我把他放進去的課室
paragraphs.en: I didn't put him in. A classroom.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 還有洗手盆他們在洗手盆邊聊天
paragraphs.en: And a washbasin. They talk to each other around the well.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 課室裡總會有些樹一隻猴子試著把另一隻猴子釣上去「笑聲」
paragraphs.en: And there are always some trees in the classroom. A monkey trying to fishanother monkey from above.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 猴子「笑聲」每個課室至少有一個天窗
paragraphs.en: Monkeys. And each classroom hasat least one skylight.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 聖誕節裡聖誕老人就是從這裡下來的這是附樓就在橢圓形幼兒園旁邊
paragraphs.en: And this is where Santa Clauscomes down at the time of Christmas. This is the annex building, right next to thatoval-shaped kindergarten.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 這座建築衹有5米高，共七層當然天花高度很低
paragraphs.en: The building is onlyfive meters tall with seven floors. And of course,the ceiling height is very low.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 所以你必須考慮安全問題我們放入我們的孩子一個男孩，一個女孩
paragraphs.en: So you have to consider safety. So, we put our children,a daughter and a son.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 他們試著跑進去他撞到頭了
paragraphs.en: They tried to go in. He hit his head.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 他沒事，頭顱很結實他復原能力很強，我的兒子「笑聲」
paragraphs.en: He's okay. His skull is quite strong. He is resilient. It's my son.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 他在看跳下去安不安全然後我們放入其他小孩
paragraphs.en: And he is trying to seeif it is safe to jump off. And then we put other children.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 大家知道，東京交通阻塞相當嚴重「笑聲」前方司機，她需要學習如何駕駛
paragraphs.en: The traffic jam is awfulin Tokyo, as you know. The driver in front,she needs to learn how to drive.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 現今小孩子需要嘗試一些輕微危險的滋味在這種情況下他們學會互相幫助
paragraphs.en: Now these days, kids need a small dosage of danger. And in this kind of occasion, they learn to help each other.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 這就是小社會。而我們現今的社會正缺少這樣的（教育）機會這幅圖顯示一個小男孩的活動範圍時間段是9：10至9：30
paragraphs.en: This is society. This is the kind ofopportunity we are losing these days. Now, this drawing is showingthe movement of a boy between 9:10 and 9:30.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 這座建築圓周為183米所以一點也不小
paragraphs.en: And the circumferenceof this building is 183 meters. So it's not exactly small at all.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 這個男孩在早上跑了6000米更讓人驚奇的還在後面
paragraphs.en: And this boy did 6,000 metersin the morning. But the surprise is yet to come.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 這個幼兒園的孩子平均跑4000米這些小孩跟其他許多幼兒園的小孩相比有最高的運動能力
paragraphs.en: The children in this kindergartendo 4,000 meters on average. And these children havethe highest athletic abilities among many kindergartens.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 幼兒園園長說：「我不去訓練他們。我們把他們放在樓頂。」「就像羊群一樣」「笑聲」他們一直跑「笑聲」
paragraphs.en: The principal says, "I don't train them.We leave them on top of the roof. Just like sheep." They keep running.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 我的觀點是：不要去控制他們不要過分保護他們他們有時需要跌倒也需要受一點傷
paragraphs.en: My point is don't control them, don't protect them too much, and they need to tumble sometimes. They need to get some injury.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 那樣會讓他們學習如果在這個世界生存我認為建築是能夠改變這個世界的建築能改變人們的生活
paragraphs.en: And that makes them learn how to live in this world. I think architecture is capableof changing this world, and people's lives.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 這也是改變孩子們生活的一種嘗試非常感謝「掌聲」
paragraphs.en: And this is one of the attemptsto change the lives of children. Thank you very much.

title: Takaharu Tezuka The Best Kindergarten You Ve Ever Seen
